nodes.text: The 773 Firepuncher rifle was a model of sniper rifle manufactured by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. that featured ablative coating and a wide-beam "burning" mode. During the Clone Wars, the 773 Firepuncher was the favored weapon of Republic snipers, including Clone Force 99 clone trooper Crosshair, who utilized a customized rifle and became a master in using the weapon in its many configurations. Crosshair continued to use the weapon to deadly effect in service to the Galactic Empire, where he commanded an Elite Squad of specialized human recruits on a mission to Onderon.
